articles.title: ‘Incredibly rare’ meteorite recovered after Gloucestershire fireball believed to be first of its kind in UK - The Independent
articles.description: Extra-terrestrial rock could provide answers about early history of Solar System and what planets are made from
articles.content: The first meteorite rocks have been recovered in Gloucestershire after they dropped to the ground from the dazzling fireball that was sighted over the UK and northern Europe at the end of last month.… [+2548 chars]

articles.title: Mind your head: scientists discover incredible self-decapitating sea slug – video - The Guardian
articles.description: Scientists at Japan’s Nara Women’s University have discovered an incredible new trait exhibited by the sacoglossan sea slug – it has the ability to decapitate itself, and then regrow its body.
articles.content: Researchers at Japans Nara Womens University have discovered a new trait exhibited by the sacoglossan sea slug it has the ability to decapitate itself, then regrow its body. The process, from sheddin… [+132 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Morrison
articles.title: Comet Catalina suggests icy visitors may have been sources of carbon on Earth - Daily Mail
articles.description: Astronomers have been studying comet Catalina using infrared observations from a NASA-backed telescope on an aeroplane to understand carbon in its tail.
articles.content:
During the earliest years of planet Earth, as our world was still forming, icy comets were essential sources of carbon that may have kick-started life, a new study claims.

articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: Archaeology news: Discovery of Galilee boat from Jesus' time proves Bible accurate - claim - Daily Express
articles.description: ARCHAEOLOGICAL discoveries from the Biblical Sea of Galilee have been hailed as definitive proof of the Bible's historical reliability. An expert has now explained how the discovery of the Ancient Galilee Boat validates Christian scripture.
